titles.title: Fighting Fertility Fraud Act of 2023
Fighting Fertility Fraud Act of 2023
To amend title 18, United States Code, to prohibit health professionals from providing false or misleading information with respect to assisted reproduction, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Fighting Fertility Fraud Act of 2023
This bill establishes federal criminal offenses for a person, health professional, or health facility that provides materially false or misleading information related to assisted reproduction.
The bill subjects a violator to criminal penaltiesâ€”a fine, a prison term of up to 10 years, or both.
It also authorizes civil remedies, including damages and injunctive relief.
